section.section:
An applicant for a license shall:
submit to the Board an application on the form that the Board provides; and
pay to the Board:
The fees authorized under this subsection may not exceed a total of $900 for a 2-year term.

text.section: An application shall be made under oath.
If an applicant wishes to do business as a collection agency at more than 1 place, the applicant shall submit a separate application and pay a separate application fee for each place.
